articles.author: Ritsuko Kawai
articles.title: What Is the ‘Super Flu’ That Is Spreading in Europe and the United States? - wired.com
articles.description: The “super flu” behind outbreaks in the US and UK is a new variant of influenza A H3N2, subclade K. Existing vaccines appear to be insufficiently effective against the virus.
articles.content: The spread of influenza became more severe this fall, particularly in the United States and the United Kingdom. The US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention has designated the 2024-25 flu season… [+3685 chars]
